title: Sea Salt & Cactus Flower Ambiance Mist
description:
Create all the cozy vibes with our skin safe Ambiance Mists. A light mist to refresh your space with ease. Use throughout your home, on linens, or anywhere that needs a gentle touch of scent. Subtle, natural, and effortlessly elevating — an everyday ritual for a calm, inviting atmosphere.

Embrace the 'good vibes only.' She's sweet yet clean and LUXURIOUS, creating a mindset of abundance while banishing negative energy. SS + CF is a must, as it's our top-selling scent in all things Mobaak. Expect sweet floral scents mingled with ocean mist and citrus peel.

Mobaak's #1 selling fragrance & absolutely the one scent you want to gift that 'hard to shop for person.'

ON THE NOSE:

  • Jasmine
  • Night Violet
  • Ocean Mist
  • Citrus Peel

Keep out of reach of children. 
4fl. oz reusable glass bottle
